message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your deal was a bit imbalanced. How about a slightly better split, for both of us?
Come on, Bob! The deal is getting worse for you with each passing round. This is your last chance to get a decent amount. Don't let the inflation eat away your share!
Okay, Alice, you drive a hard bargain. Let's settle this - I'll accept your initial offer of 60-40.
